title: Vibration mechanism no longer shakes the phone, I think it is detached or something. Suggestions?
content:
One day the phone no longer vibrated for any reason. The mechanism can be faintly heard sometimes, it is either detached from the chassis or at reduced power or something.
Have tried with no luck the following:
Turning on and off. 
Internet research.
The various triggers to make it vibrate etc. 
Nothing makes it shake the phone. 
Have checked all the settings.
